task.title: Starting the cluster on the current master node

taskbody.context: Use this procedure to complete the startup on the current master node.

step.cmd: Use the virtual hostname or virtual IP address of the high-availability cluster to log in to the master node .
Confirm that the resource starts up.
Take the original master host out of standby mode.
step.stepxmp: Replace Previous-Master with the hostname of the previous master host node: pcs cluster unstandy Previous-Master

step.cmd: Confirm that disk replication is started.

step.stepxmp: For example, the application: serviced service start Zenoss.resmgr
